full_text:
Fixed a bug in my Snaps by Formations shiny app (h/t to @clt_ny for pointing it out). Tested it this morning on the #HoustonTexans, and holy wow, the texans defense has only rolled out three (3) total defensive formations all year?? 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/HjOAODQys9

Got a request for snaps of players on rookie contracts (so first four years in NFL), so here's the data. If you think of years 1-4 like college, we've got 4 years of freshmen, 3 years of sophomores, 2 of juniors, and 1 senior class (2019 draft class). 

#nflverse #rstats https://t.co/9cyPS7L6Rl
